descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Skimpy Clothing and Armor
Author: Edhildil
07,20,2012
ver1.2 beta (updated)

[img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/872/pagelogoy.jpg[/img]

Please read the whole description before you comment.


[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

This is a female clothing and armor replacer, it will change most of the armor, robes, and some clothing in your entire game into skimpy, sexy, bodacious hot stuff. The body is based off of Caliente\'s CBBE mod, and you\'ll need that first (see requirements).  

The lowerbody has been enhanced in the derrier region (buttock)
for a fuller, rounder profile. The waist is somewhat thinner.
The breasts are lifted and slightly rounder (large).  
 
I only made one size so the sliders will not work (sorry).
If you liked my DMRA mods for Oblivion you should like this mod too.
I did not add bouncing boobs or butt though.

Bandit, Daedric, Dark Brotherhood, Dragonbone, Dragonscale, Draugr, Dwarven, Ebony, Ebony Mail, Elven, Falmer, Glass, Hide, Imperial, Iron, Nightingale, Orcish, Savior\'s Hide, Steel, Steel Plated, Studded, Theives Guild, Tullius, and Wolf armors, all skimpy.

Barkeeper, Chef, Hammerfell Garb, Jester, Archmage, Mage Apprentice, Monk, Necromancer, Warlock, Forsworn, Mythic Dawn, Mage Journeyman clothing, Thalmor Robes, all mostly skimpy. 

Some of the items share meshes such as Hammerfell and Redguard garb, Tullius and Penitus Oculatus etc. The robes do the same.

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]

11,19,2012: v1.2: 

fixed the gaps in the the neck, wrists and ankles by changing vertices locations to match femalebody_0. I will not make a smaller size, that would require a complete redo and my pupils are already square from working on this. If you got the old version just download and reinstall.
I plan to add proper dismemberment and bounce to the next update, this may take some time.

Optional nude body file added. Note: Im not sure if beast textures will work as Argonian seemed to have invisible area around the hips, I don\'t know about Khajit, I didnt see these textures included in CBBE.

BBP
=====================

 See usage below.


[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game.(textures)

[img]http://img163.imageshack.us/img163/6344/suggesth.png[/img]

 
Calientes_Vanilla_Armor_--__Combined_Pack_v2 

Edhildils Argonian CBBE Skin Texture

VHH_walk
 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]

if you use Calientes_Vanilla_Armor_--__Combined_Pack_v2, install it first
before you install this mod; in other words, install my mod AFTER caliente\'s.

Unzip Data file to a temporary location 
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.

[img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/9223/bugske.png[/img]

using Caliente Tools after installing this mod may replace the meshes
from this mod, but i\'m not sure. It just seems like it may overwrite
these meshes. That\'s why you install this mod after caliente\'s.

Even though I thought I got the Skyrim supported version of NifSkope,
it will not show me the dismemberment vertices, so I may have the 
dismemberments off, but, alot of the arms and legs are bare, so it 
shouldn\'t be a big deal, some boots clip*, I will fix this when
I can figure out the dismemberment vertices, thus, it is beta.

*Wearing Daedric boots with the Hammerfell and Redguard garb made 
the boots invisible in my testings, but Redguard boots were displayed fine. 

I didn\'t make first person meshes, so there is some incontinuity ( I play
it this way all the time and I barely notice), my sleeveless armors may have
sleeves in first person, in other words. 

Some poses/ animations may slightly clip. Some greatswords will clip 
into the round butt. If I could only rotate the weapon node in the skeleton...

[img]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/9233/uninstall.png[/img]

You can delete all the clothing and armor folders included in my mod from your data files. mine is:
 
C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\armor:

bandit, blades, daedric, dbarmor, dragonbone, dragonscale, draugr, dwarven,ebony, ebonymail, elven, falmer, generaltulius, glass, hide, imperial, iron, nightingale, nordplate, orcish, savior\'shide, sons of talos, steel, studded,thievesguild, wolf

C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\clothes

archmage, barkeeper, chef, jester, forswornarmor, mageapprentice, magejourneyman,monk, necromancer, robemythicdawn, thalmor, warlock

You can also use this as a guide if you just want to replace a few of the 
armors in your game by copying the appropriate folder, say you just want iron armor from this mod, you would copy:

Data\\meshes\\armor\\iron

and then paste that folder in your game data, mine is default, which is:

C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\meshes\\armor

That means copy/paste the \"iron\" folder from this mod into the \"armor\" folder on your computer.

I would do more of the standard clothes but I like using Caliente\'s
Vanilla Armor TownspersonPack for this.

[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
Edhildil (these new meshes)
Bethesda (original meshes)

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod. I tried to convert to BBP but failed. I now give permission for anybody to convert to BBP, as my efforts seem fruitless. I really like the way TBBP functions, and would like to see animators incorporate Buttock Bounce at least in the Forward Walk animation like I made for Oblivion.  Enjoy!
author: Edhildil
